data.lyric:
[ti:SO DONE]
[ar:The Kid LAROI]
[al:SO DONE]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]SO DONE - The Kid LAROI
[00:02.24]Lyrics by：Charlton Howard/Khaled Rohaim/Omer Fedi
[00:04.49]Composed by：Charlton Howard/Khaled Rohaim/Omer Fedi
[00:06.74]Okay I realize now that everything that I did was wrong
[00:12.41]
[00:13.39]Okay I realize now some things are better off said than done
[00:19.29]
[00:19.96]Okay I realize now that maybe I'm not ready for love
[00:25.76]
[00:26.84]Okay I realize now I finished us before we begun-un
[00:33.50]I'm done so done I'm done with all the games you play
[00:40.28]I'm numb so numb I'm numb to all the pain you bring
[00:46.94]I'm tryna figure this all out for myself
[00:50.28]
[00:50.81]I don't need you or nobody else I'm done so done
[00:56.24]
[00:57.13]So done so done so done so done I'm done
[01:01.19]Oh no no-no-no no-no-no
[01:07.50]I think that it's time for you to realize
[01:09.31]That I'm not gon' be here forever but I
[01:11.11]Wish that I was but you were the 'cause
[01:12.73]For every lil' feelin' I'm feeling aside
[01:14.40]Sometimes I'm sad and I think about why
[01:16.10]I even trusted you shit unsurprisin'
[01:17.73]I'm walkin' away from you it's about time
[01:19.39]Want you to walk out and walk out of my life
[01:21.15]And you yeah you
[01:23.28]Yeah you
[01:23.95]You stay on my mind way more than I would like for you to
[01:27.66]And you yeah you
[01:30.22]The reason I can't find no love don't wanna find no one
[01:34.10]'Cause I'm done so done I'm done with all the games you play
[01:40.83]I'm numb so numb I'm numb to all the pain you bring
[01:47.51]I'm tryna figure this all out for myself
[01:51.45]I don't need you or nobody else I'm done so done
[01:56.77]
[01:57.71]So done so done so done so done I'm done
data.trans:
[ti:SO DONE]
[ar:The Kid LAROI]
[al:SO DONE]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.24]//
[00:04.48]//
[00:06.72]好吧 我现在意识到我所做的一切都大错特错
[00:13.52]好吧 我现在意识到有些事说出口好过付诸行动
[00:20.06]好吧 我现在意识到也许我还没有为爱做好准备
[00:27.03]好吧 我现在意识到在我们还未开始前 我就结束了这段感情
[00:34.06]我身心俱疲 我受够了你玩弄的把戏
[00:40.45]我麻木不已 对你带来的痛苦无动于衷
[00:47.23]我想为我自己弄清楚这一切
[00:50.87]我不需要你 或是任何其他人 我已经忍无可忍
[00:57.23]身心俱疲 我已经忍无可忍
[01:02.70]//
[01:07.66]我想是时候让你明白
[01:09.57]我不会永远留在你身边
[01:11.12]但是我希望我留下 可你是
[01:12.82]我心底每一丝苦楚的根源所在
[01:14.39]有时我静静坐着 我在想为什么
[01:16.40]我对你深信不疑 该死 我震惊不已
[01:18.18]是我离开你的时候了
[01:19.51]希望你转身离开 离开我的生活
[01:21.16]你 你
[01:23.49]你
[01:24.03]你萦绕在我心头 已经超出我的想象
[01:28.02]你 你
[01:30.70]是我找不到爱的原因 我不想再争吵不休
[01:34.28]因为我身心俱疲 我受够了你玩弄的把戏
[01:40.96]我麻木不已 对你带来的痛苦无动于衷
[01:48.10]我想为我自己弄清楚这一切
[01:51.53]我不需要你 或是任何其他人 我已经忍无可忍
[01:57.75]身心俱疲 我已经忍无可忍
